titleStmt.title: Gods husbandry: the first part. Tending to shew the difference betwixt the hypocrite and the true-hearted Christian. As it was deliuered in certaine sermons, and is now published by William Whately, preacher of the Word of God in Banbury in Oxfordsheire
titleStmt.author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Bernard Alsop [and Felix Kyngston] for Thomas Man, and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster-row, at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Part 2 has separate pagination, register, and dated title page with "At London, imprinted by Felix Kyngston" in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Some print faded and show-through; some pages torn. Part 1 pages 64-65, 78-79 and part 2 pages 12-13, 76-79 from Harvard University. Library copy spliced at end.

place.placeName: his shop in Pater-noster-row, at the signe of the Talbot
